- Viber is one of the worst messaging/calling apps when it comes to call quality (audio & video). We compared it to 20 popular chat/call apps using the Pixel 8 Pro, iPhone 15 Pro Max, and S24 Ultra. - It sends and receives messages later than others, even on the same WiFi or 5G connection. - When sending multiple photos, it scatters them one by one rather than in a collage format (like Telegram, etc.). - The advertisements are obtrusive. - It needs a complete UI overhaul Viber, wake up!
